thread.title: Engineers Assess Spillway Problem at Oroville Dam
thread.title_full: Engineers Assess Spillway Problem at Oroville Dam

author: KQED Science
title: Engineers Assess Spillway Problem at Oroville Dam

organizations.name: oroville dam california department of water resources

text:
California Department of Water Resources crews are assessing a potentially serious problem with Oroville Dam, the giant structure that impounds the Feather River to create the state’s second-largest reservoir. 
Tuesday morning, the spillway that managers use to release water from Lake Oroville into the river appeared to suffer a partial Read More … 
Source:: Newsfix – Science
